About Me

I'm a full-stack developer based in Nairobi with expertise in Ruby on Rails and JavaScript frameworks like React. My experience encompasses building scalable web applications, designing RESTful APIs, and collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams.

With a strong focus on detail and a knack for problem-solving, I thrive in dynamic environments.
